What are the symptoms of Lipodermatosclerosis ?,What are the signs and symptoms of lipodermatosclerosis? Lipodermatosclerosis refers to changes in the skin of the lower legs. One or both legs may be involved. Signs and symptoms vary but may include: Pain Hardening and/or thickening of the skin Varicose veins Changes in skin color (redness) Small white scarred areas (atrophie blanche) Swelling Leg ulcers Tapering of the legs above the ankles,GA
